channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Patel fires back at media critics after uncovering secret FBI 'burn bags' with classified documents
item.description: Classified documents from Durham report found in FBI burn bags will be declassified and released to Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Chuck Grassley...

item.title: Ex-Trump prosecutor Jack Smith under investigation by government watchdog Office of Special Counsel
item.description: Former special counsel Jack Smith, who was involved with probes into Donald Trump, is being investigated by the Office of Special Counsel.

item.title: Dick Morris to Newsmax: Democratic Party's Future Is Bleak
item.description: If current trends continue, there may not be a Democratic Party in the future, presidential adviser Dick Morris said on Newsmax Saturday.

item.title: Democrats Work to Counter Texas Redistricting Plan
item.description: Democrats across America are paying attention to a mostly Republican-controlled redistricting plan in Texas and looking at ways to counter the move.
